tasks.task: Build a shade structure for chickens
subtasks: Gather materials (cattle panels, shade cloth, zip ties, cedar 2x4s)
Measure and cut 2x4s to create frame
Assemble frame using zip ties or other secure fasteners
attach shade cloth to frame, ensuring coverage and secure attachment
Position structure over chicken area to provide shade

tasks.task: Keep chickens cool in hot weather
subtasks: Assess environmental conditions when temperatures rise
Implement shading solution to reduce heat exposure
Monitor chicken behavior and adjust structure as needed
